element.name: ui
element.description: Root element (related to Custom UI window).

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: modal
attribute.description: If true, the dialog window will be modal.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: title
attribute.description: Title of the Custom UI window.

attribute.name: resizable
attribute.description: Make window resizable if true.

attribute.name: closeable
attribute.description: Make window closeable if true.

attribute.name: layout
attribute.description: Layout of the widget. When layout is 'none', specify widget placement using the geometry attribute, like: geometry="x,y,width,height".

attribute.name: content-margins
attribute.description: Sets the left, top, right, and bottom margins to use around the layout.

attribute.name: placement
attribute.description: Placement of the window widget. It will affect how the position attribute is interpreted.

attribute.name: position
attribute.description: Position of the window widget.

attribute.name: size
attribute.description: Initial size of the window widget. -1,-1 will use the default behavior (automatically compute the optimal size).

attribute.name: activate
attribute.description: If false, the window is shown without activating it (Qt flag WA_ShowWithoutActivating).

attribute.name: on-close
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the close event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle). When a callback is specified, the window will not close upon pressing the close button. It may be hidden or destroyed explicitly in the callback.

element.name: button
element.description: Push button widget.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: text
attribute.description: Text on the button.

attribute.name: default
attribute.description: If true, this is the default button of the dialog window.

attribute.name: auto-repeat
attribute.description: If auto-repeat is enabled, then the click() signal is emitted at regular intervals when the button is down.

attribute.name: auto-repeat-delay
attribute.description: Defines the initial delay in milliseconds before auto-repetition kicks in.

attribute.name: auto-repeat-interval
attribute.description: Defines the length of the auto-repetition interval in milliseconds.

attribute.name: checkable
attribute.description: If true, the button is checkable.

attribute.name: checked
attribute.description: If true, the button is initially checked.

attribute.name: auto-exclusive
attribute.description: If true, checkable buttons that belong to the same parent widget behave as if they were part of the same exclusive button group. In an exclusive button group, only one button can be checked at any time; checking another button automatically unchecks the previously checked one.

attribute.name: on-click
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the click event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id).

attribute.name: icon
attribute.description: Name of a icon to use. The only icon name scheme supported is default://SP_xxx where SP_xxx is a constant from http://doc.qt.io/qt-5/qstyle.html#StandardPixmap-enum

element.name: checkbox
element.description: Checkbox widget.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: text
attribute.description: Text on the checkbox label.

attribute.name: checked
attribute.description: If true, the checkbox is initially checked.

attribute.name: checkable
attribute.description: If true, the button is checkable.

attribute.name: auto-exclusive
attribute.description: If true, checkable buttons that belong to the same parent widget behave as if they were part of the same exclusive button group. In an exclusive button group, only one button can be checked at any time; checking another button automatically unchecks the previously checked one.

attribute.name: on-change
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the change event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, newValue).

element.name: combobox
element.description: A combobox widget. It allows to select one from many items from a dropdown menu. Items can be added as child XML nodes, e.g. <item>Item text</item>, or dynamically via the script API.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: checkable
attribute.description: If true, the button is checkable.

attribute.name: auto-exclusive
attribute.description: If true, checkable buttons that belong to the same parent widget behave as if they were part of the same exclusive button group. In an exclusive button group, only one button can be checked at any time; checking another button automatically unchecks the previously checked one.

attribute.name: on-change
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the change event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, newValue).

element.name: edit
element.description: A widget for text input.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Initial text.

attribute.name: password
attribute.description: If true, display platform-dependent password mask characters instead of the characters actually entered.

attribute.name: evaluate-expressions
attribute.description: If true, the text input into the edit will be evaluated by the sandbox script.

attribute.name: on-change
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the change event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, newValue).

attribute.name: on-editing-finished
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the editing finished event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, newValue).

element.name: group
element.description: A widget for grouping other widgets. Other widgets are specified as children of the <group> node. It has its own layout, so it can be used to use a different layout only for a group of widgets. It is also required to group a set of radiobutton widgets.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: flat
attribute.description: If true, the group will have no visual appearance (text will be ignored). Otherwise, it will have some visual appearance, depending on the platform.

attribute.name: layout
attribute.description: Layout of the widget. When layout is 'none', specify widget placement using the geometry attribute, like: geometry="x,y,width,height".

attribute.name: content-margins
attribute.description: Sets the left, top, right, and bottom margins to use around the layout.

element.name: hslider
element.description: A horizontal slider widget.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Initial value.

attribute.name: minimum
attribute.description: Minimum value.

attribute.name: maximum
attribute.description: Maximum value.

attribute.name: tick-interval
attribute.description: Tick interval.

attribute.name: tick-position
attribute.description: In which direction to draw ticks.

attribute.name: inverted
attribute.description: If true, minimum and maximum will be swapped.

attribute.name: on-change
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the change event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, newValue).

element.name: image
element.description: A image display widget.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: file
attribute.description: Display the image from the specified file.

attribute.name: width
attribute.description: Desired width for the initial image.

attribute.name: height
attribute.description: Desired height for the initial image.

attribute.name: scaled-contents
attribute.description: This property holds whether this widget will scale its image to fill all available space.

attribute.name: keep-aspect-ratio
attribute.description: If true, and also scaled-contents is true, will keep aspect ratio when resizing.

attribute.name: on-mouse-down
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the mouseDown event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, type, flags, x, y).

attribute.name: on-mouse-up
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the mouseUp event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, type, flags, x, y).

attribute.name: on-mouse-move
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the mouseMove event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, type, flags, x, y).

element.name: label
element.description: A static text widget.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: text
attribute.description: Text on the label.

attribute.name: word-wrap
attribute.description: If true, long text will wrap in multiple lines, otherwise will be cut.

attribute.name: on-link-activated
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the linkActivated event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, linkHref).

element.name: plot
element.description: A widget for displaying time series charts.

attribute.name: background-color
attribute.description: Color of the background, as three RGB components in the 0...255 range. The special value -1,-1,-1 means to use the color of the window's background.

attribute.name: foreground-color
attribute.description: Color of the foreground elements (i.e.: axes, axes labels, tick labels, tick marks and grid lines), as three RGB components in the 0...255 range. The special value -1,-1,-1 means to use the default color. This value can be overridden by any of the specific attributes for the individual elements.

attribute.name: axis-color
attribute.description: Color of the axes, as three RGB components in the 0...255 range. The special value -1,-1,-1 means to use the default color. Can be overridden by axis-x-color and axis-y-color.

attribute.name: label-color
attribute.description: Color of the axis labels, as three RGB components in the 0...255 range. The special value -1,-1,-1 means to use the default color. Can be overridden by label-x-color and label-y-color.

attribute.name: grid-color
attribute.description: Color of the grid, as three RGB components in the 0...255 range. The special value -1,-1,-1 means to use the default color. Can be overridden by grid-x-color and grid-y-color.

attribute.name: tick-label-color
attribute.description: Color of the tick labels, as three RGB components in the 0...255 range. The special value -1,-1,-1 means to use the default color.

attribute.name: axis-x-color
attribute.description: Color of the X axis, as three RGB components in the 0...255 range. The special value -1,-1,-1 means to use the default color.

attribute.name: axis-y-color
attribute.description: Color of the Y axis, as three RGB components in the 0...255 range. The special value -1,-1,-1 means to use the default color.

attribute.name: label-x-color
attribute.description: Color of the X label, as three RGB components in the 0...255 range. The special value -1,-1,-1 means to use the default color.

attribute.name: label-y-color
attribute.description: Color of the Y label, as three RGB components in the 0...255 range. The special value -1,-1,-1 means to use the default color.

attribute.name: grid-x-color
attribute.description: Color of the X grid, as three RGB components in the 0...255 range. The special value -1,-1,-1 means to use the default color.

attribute.name: grid-y-color
attribute.description: Color of the Y grid, as three RGB components in the 0...255 range. The special value -1,-1,-1 means to use the default color.

attribute.name: tick-label-x-color
attribute.description: Color of the X tick labels, as three RGB components in the 0...255 range. The special value -1,-1,-1 means to use the default color.

attribute.name: tick-label-y-color
attribute.description: Color of the Y tick labels, as three RGB components in the 0...255 range. The special value -1,-1,-1 means to use the default color.

attribute.name: max-buffer-size
attribute.description: Maximum size of the buffer(s).

attribute.name: cyclic-buffer
attribute.description: If true, buffers will be cyclic when full.

attribute.name: ticks
attribute.description: If true, x and y tickmarks will be visible.

attribute.name: x-ticks
attribute.description: If true, x tickmarks will be visible.

attribute.name: y-ticks
attribute.description: If true, y tickmarks will be visible.

attribute.name: tick-labels
attribute.description: If true, x and y tick labels will be visible.

attribute.name: x-tick-labels
attribute.description: If true, x tick labels will be visible.

attribute.name: y-tick-labels
attribute.description: If true, y tick labels will be visible.

attribute.name: on-click
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the click event on a curve data point. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, curveName, dataIndex, xValue, yValue).

attribute.name: on-legend-click
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the click event on a legend item. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, curveName).

element.name: progressbar
element.description: A progress indicator widget.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: minimum
attribute.description: Minimum value of the progress.

attribute.name: maximum
attribute.description: Maximum value of the progress.

attribute.name: orientation
attribute.description: Orientation.

attribute.name: inverted
attribute.description: If true, the progress ends will be inverted.

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Initial value.

attribute.name: text-visible
attribute.description: Visibility of progress text.

element.name: radiobutton
element.description: A radio button widget.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: text
attribute.description: Text on the button.

attribute.name: checked
attribute.description: If true, this button will be initially checked.

attribute.name: on-click
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the click event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id).

element.name: scene3d
element.description: A widget for displaying a 3D scene.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: clear-color
attribute.description: Color of the background, as three RGB components in the 0...255 range. The special value -1,-1,-1 means to use the color of the window's background.

attribute.name: on-click
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the click event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, nodeId).

element.name: spinbox
element.description: A widget for numeric input, with increase/decrease buttons.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Initial value.

attribute.name: minimum
attribute.description: Minimum value.

attribute.name: maximum
attribute.description: Maximum value.

attribute.name: prefix
attribute.description: String prefix in the displayed value.

attribute.name: suffix
attribute.description: String suffix in the displayed value.

attribute.name: step
attribute.description: Step (increment/decrement) when using the buttons.

attribute.name: decimals
attribute.description: Number of displayed decimal places.

attribute.name: float
attribute.description: If true, the spinbox will display a floating point value. If false, the spinbox will display integer values. If omitted, this property will be automatically determined by minimum/maximum/step values: if any of those is not a round integer, or if decimals is specified, the spinbox will be float.

attribute.name: on-change
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the change event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, newValue).

element.name: table
element.description: A table widget. Can optionally contain a <header> elements and <row> elements. Each <header>/<row> element contains only <item> elements. <item> elements may have an optional "editable" attribute of type bool.

attribute.name: show-horizontal-header
attribute.description: If true, column headers will be visible.

attribute.name: show-vertical-header
attribute.description: If true, row headers will be visible. The 'label' attribute of the <row> can be used to change the displayed text of the row header. The default row header is the line number.

attribute.name: autosize-horizontal-header
attribute.description: If true, column headers will resize to fit contents.

attribute.name: autosize-vertical-header
attribute.description: If true, row headers will resize to fit contents.

attribute.name: show-grid
attribute.description: If true, grid will be visible.

attribute.name: selection-mode
attribute.description: Controls the selection behavior, i.e. if the user can select individual items, entire rows, or entire columns.

attribute.name: editable
attribute.description: If true, cells will be editable.

attribute.name: sortable
attribute.description: If true, it will be possible to sort data by columns by clicking on column headers.

attribute.name: on-cell-activate
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the cell activate event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, row, column, cellValue).

attribute.name: on-selection-change
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the selection change event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, row, column). If selection mode is 'rows', column will be -1 and vice versa.

attribute.name: on-key-press
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the key press event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, key, text).

element.name: tabs
element.description: A tabs widget. Must contain only <tab> child elements.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

element.name: tab
element.description: A tab for the tabs widget. Can only be contained in a <tabs> element. Can contain widgets, just like <ui> and <group>, and has its own layout.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: title
attribute.description: Title of the tab.

attribute.name: layout
attribute.description: Layout of the widget. When layout is 'none', specify widget placement using the geometry attribute, like: geometry="x,y,width,height".

attribute.name: content-margins
attribute.description: Sets the left, top, right, and bottom margins to use around the layout.

element.name: text-browser
element.description: A text browser widget.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: text
attribute.description: Initial text content.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: the type of the text content

attribute.name: read-only
attribute.description: if true, text will be read-only

attribute.name: word-wrap
attribute.description: If true, long text will wrap in multiple lines, otherwise a horizontal scroll bar will be visible.

attribute.name: on-change
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the change event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, newText).

attribute.name: on-link-activated
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the linkActivated event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, linkHref).

element.name: tree
element.description: A tree widget. Must contain one <header> element and many <row> elements. Each <header>/<row> element contains only <item> elements. <row> elements can have 'id' and 'parent-id' attributes (positive integers) to set relationships between items, and a 'expanded' attribute (bool) to initially expand the item.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: show-header
attribute.description: If true, column headers will be visible.

attribute.name: autosize-header
attribute.description: If true, column headers will resize to fit contents.

attribute.name: sortable
attribute.description: If true, it will be possible to sort data by columns by clicking on column headers.

attribute.name: on-selection-change
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the selection change event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, item_id).

element.name: vslider
element.description: A vertical slider widget.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Initial value.

attribute.name: minimum
attribute.description: Minimum value.

attribute.name: maximum
attribute.description: Maximum value.

attribute.name: tick-interval
attribute.description: Tick interval.

attribute.name: tick-position
attribute.description: In which direction to draw ticks.

attribute.name: inverted
attribute.description: If true, minimum and maximum will be swapped.

attribute.name: on-change
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the change event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, newValue).

element.name: svg
element.description: An SVG widget. Content can be embedded in the XML.

attribute.name: enabled
attribute.description: Enable status of widget.

attribute.name: stretch
attribute.description: Stretch factor to insert the widget in the parent layout.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Qt stylesheet.

attribute.name: file
attribute.description: File to load.

attribute.name: on-mouse-down
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the mouseDown event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, type, flags, x, y).

attribute.name: on-mouse-up
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the mouseUp event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, type, flags, x, y).

attribute.name: on-mouse-move
attribute.description: Name of a script function to handle the mouseMove event. Arguments of the function are: (uiHandle, id, type, flags, x, y).

element.name: stretch
element.description: Special element that can be put inside a parent with layout (such as <ui>, <group> or <tab>) if the layout is hbox or vbox.

attribute.name: factor
attribute.description: Stretch factor (see http://doc.qt.io/qt-4.8/layout.html#stretch-factors).

element.name: br
element.description: Special element that can be put inside a parent with layout (such as <ui>, <group> or <tab>) if the layout is grid, and it is used to begin a new line in the grid layout.
